channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te P?mu K?mara
channel.desc: It's the school holidays. While P?ora Patero and Grace are still plotting, Nan has a fun surprise for the tamariki. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te P?mu K?mara
channel.desc: Marama has a new crush. The tamariki are offered a once in a lifetime opportunity. Tai and Amaia become distant. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te P?mu K?mara
channel.desc: Tai and Amaia don't see eye to eye. N?kau meets a new friend. Grace and P?ora Patero's plan is put into action. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Why Apu?
channel.desc: NEW: We've covered the taiao issues currently facing Te Tair?whiti and now it's time to profile those on the ground trying to find altrernative pathways forward.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: NEW: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Once Were Gardeners
channel.desc: PREMIERE: A gardening show like none other, full of laughs, learnings and featuring some ?out the gate? characters whose m?tauranga, excitement and passion for the m?ra is seriously infectious. Meretini Bennett-Huxtable.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: NZ Wars: The Stories of Ruapekapeka
channel.desc: The Stories of Ruapekapeka, a documentary highlighting Northland's most infamous armed conflict, is hosted by Mihinarangi Forbes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Crown Lynn
channel.desc: CROWN LYNN: A M?ori Story revisits a place and time in New Zealand history that was on the cusp of change both socially and politically through the eyes of Crown Lynn Pottery's former M?ori employees and their whanau. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Stolen Children Of Aotearoa
channel.desc: Reveals a forgotten chapter in New Zealand's history, exploring the profound impact of M?ori children being separated from their families and communities by the state. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: Music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. Includes old music videos updated with graphic factoids.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Te Rotorua-nui-a-Kahumatamomoe to uncover the story behind the original name of Mokoia island, ?Te Motu Tapu a Tinirau?. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Ra?kau, Pond Koka?, Pu and Waea Wao live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: Still trying to make up for her mistake, Rangi calls on mysterious friends in the mist to help them trick the ponaturi and get the godstick back. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamaiti T? Spring
channel.desc: From clearing grass to counting eggs, the whanau prepares the maara for a bountiful spring harvest, with a giggle-filled lesson in manure along the way. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: NEW: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. In this episode we visit, North Shore Eco Tours, and Manea: Footprints of Kupe. (R).

channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Something for the People
channel.desc: A weekly live series that masterfully blends comedy, lively banter and high quality Te Reo M?ori to offer a fresh engaging perspective on contemporary M?ori issues. Hosted by Chey Milne, Kereama Wright and Dr Hinurewa Poutu. (R).

channel.desc: P?p? Tei Nohotima shares waiata and karakia using r?kau, p?kura (short sticks) and t?t?t?rea (long sticks). (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Aro
channel.desc: Join presenter and Tikitiki local Cushla Tangaere and the community as they show us why their RSA is special and what it means to them. We follow the community as they prepare for ANZAC day. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Toa Hunter Gatherer
channel.desc: Adventurer Owen Boynton presents a holistic view of gathering kai as he travels the country to meet like-minded kaitiaki and outdoor experts. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tui Teka's Trail
channel.desc: Tui helps a young farrier out with Max the stallion who front foots and double barrel kicks. Up the East Coast, Tui shares some tips and tricks. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: Ng?ti Hine FM DJ Amber Smith and her father head out in search of monster kingfish, while Gavin is deep in the Ruahine Ranges determined to fill the freezer with venison. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Feral
channel.desc: From wild hog hunting to silver carp fishing, adventure-loving culinary explorer Via Vang is ready to chase, kill, cook, and eat all the crazy creatures that have overstayed their welcome.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: Music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. Includes old music videos updated with graphic factoids. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunting Aotearoa
channel.desc: Join skilled hunter-gatherer, Peter Peeti, for another exciting hunting season. Pete is on the hunt for Red Deer and Wild Pigs in the Bay of Plenty. (R).[(96057)]
